author: andschwa
body: getlogin   actually gets the username of the logged in user of the associated terminal, introducing a dependency on a TTY, which we can't have on Jenkins  and shouldn't have in general . getpwuid geteuid    is actually what we wanted originally. VSO create date - 9/23/2015 15:51:00     VSO closed date - 9/24/2015 8:47:00
title: Remove TTY dependency from GetUserName
